select * from singer ORDER BY singerId desc

select pm.messageId,pm.messMusic,pm.addtime,p.pkName,s.singerName,count(v.votePkmessid) as votesum from pk_message pm LEFT JOIN pk p on pm.messPkid=p.pkId LEFT JOIN singer s on pm.messSingerid=s.singerId LEFT JOIN vote v on pm.messageId=v.votePkmessid GROUP BY pm.messageId
